name: SmithingInventory
description: The SmithingInventory class provides specialized access to Minecraft's smithing table interface, allowing scripts to interact with smithing operations such as upgrading diamond gear to netherite gear.
overview:
This class extends the base Inventory class and adds smithing-specific functionality for managing the input slots and output slot.

Smithing tables in Minecraft have three main slots:
- **Left Input (Slot 0):** The template item (e.g., Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template)
- **Right Input (Slot 1):** The base item to be upgraded (e.g., Diamond Sword) and the mineral (e.g., Netherite Ingot)
- **Output (Slot 2):** The resulting upgraded item after applying the smithing operation

methods.name: getLeftInput
methods.description: Retrieves the item currently in the Left Input slot (Slot 0), typically used for the smithing template.

methods.name: getRightInput
methods.description: Retrieves the item currently in the Right Input slot (Slot 1), typically used for the base item to be upgraded or the mineral.

methods.name: getOutput
methods.description: Retrieves the item currently in the Output slot (Slot 2), representing the resulting upgraded item.
